name: spiral-software

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: build_type
variants.description: Build the Release version by default

description:
SPIRAL is a program generation system for linear transforms and other
mathematical functions that produces very high performance code for a
wide spectrum of hardware platforms.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependent_to.name: fftx
dependent_to.description:
FFTX is the exascale follow-on to the FFTW open source discrete FFT
package for executing the Fast Fourier Transform as well as higher-level
operations composed of linear operations combined with DFT transforms.

dependent_to.name: spiral-package-fftx
dependent_to.description:
This is the SPIRAL package for FFTX: FFTX is the exascale follow-on to
the FFTW open source discrete FFT package for executing the Fast Fourier
Transform as well as higher-level operations composed of linear
operations combined with DFT transforms.

dependent_to.name: spiral-package-hcol
dependent_to.description:
This is the SPIRAL package for the Hybrid Control Operator Language
(HCOL).

dependent_to.name: spiral-package-mpi
dependent_to.description: This is the SPIRAL package for MPI.

dependent_to.name: spiral-package-simt
dependent_to.description:
This is the SPIRAL package for SIMT: SIMT, single instruction multiple
threads, is used to generate code for GPUs and multi-threading
aplications.
